caption: Algorithm 1 Simply-Test-to-Commit (ST2C) Algorithm
description: This algorithm is designed for decision-making problems with structured observations (DMSO) and delayed, anonymous rewards. It iteratively chooses decisions, observes outcomes and rewards, and updates its model.  The core logic involves testing whether a new model g is significantly better than the current model f based on a log-likelihood ratio test,  incorporating a penalty term involving the maximum contamination. If a better model is found, the algorithm switches to it.  This procedure is repeated until the end of the time horizon.
